title: Gokuu no Daibouken (Adventures of the Monkey King)
synopsis: In this film, because of complaints from children that Goku is depicted as too much of an eager student, he is instead portrayed as a very naughty modern boy. It then received so many complaints from the PTA about its bad language that it was forced out of the show after all.
related_anime: ['Gokuu no Daibouken Pilot', 'Boku no Son Gokuu']
staff: [['Sugii, Gisaburou', ['Director']], ['Suzuki, Yoshio', ['Sound Director']], ['Dezaki, Osamu', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard', ' Animation Director', ' Key Animation']], ['Hata, Masami', ['Episode Director']]]
